title: Systematic Instructional Design Program for Strengthening Library Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic academic information search experience
context.additional_context: Situation requiring advanced information retrieval skills for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to perform research and tasks. Need for blended learning design conducted in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can extract target materials with 90% accuracy using advanced search strategies in discipline-specific academic databases.
Learners can evaluate the credibility of academic materials with 85% accuracy by applying information critique criteria
Learners can construct reference lists matching research project topics in MLA/APA format with 95% accuracy
Learners can produce research reports free from academic misconduct by leveraging digital literacy competencies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
